Name: Eterna: Heroes Fall
About the game: Zu Digital presents: an epic fantasy tale spanning decades. The world of Eterna is in grave danger, seemingly abandoned by their creators, the mortal races bicker among themselves. Long-standing feuds between Humans and Behemoths threaten to erupt into open conflict and it falls to you to restore order to these troubled lands Be Who You Want! Define your features, and abilities using our in-depth character creation system Choose Your Weaponry! Select One Of Two Distinct Character Classes Establish A Bloodline! Fight through multiple decades of Adventures, and begin a line of heroes. Vanquish Your Foes Master the turn-based tactical combat system, and dominate the battlefield. Make Allies and Enemies Fight our join other players on their quests, and experience Eterna together. Key Features Craft mighty weapons of war and armaments with the aid of gods Explore the diverse and mysterious lands of Centur Face horrific adversaries in combat Customize your hero and create your unique champion both mechanically and cosmetically. Hunt down monsters demons and beasts for great loot Create your own playstyleand bent the continent to your will Explore various areas Leap headfirst into the unknown and explore the diverse and exotic world of Centura: delve into the deepest dungeons or climb atop the highest mountain peaks
